text: The following is a list of rivers of Alabama, by letter: *Alabama River *Bear Creek *Black Warrior River *Blackwater River *Broglen River *Buttahatchee River *Cahaba River *Chattahoochee River *Chattooga River *Choctawhatchee River *Conecuh River *Coosa River *Dog River *Duck River *Elk River *Escambia River *Escatawpa River *Fish River *Flint River *Fowl River *Little Choctawhatchee River *Little New River *Little River *Little Tallapoosa River *Little Warrior River *Locust Fork *Magnolia River *Mobile River *Mulberry Fork *New River *North River *Noxubee River *Paint Rock River *Patsaliga Creek *Pea River *Perdido River *Sepulga River *Sipsey River *Sipsey Fork *Styx River *Sucarnoochee River *Tallapoosa River *Tennessee River *Tensaw River *Tombigbee River *Waxahatchee Creek *Yellow River Alabama *
title: List of rivers of Alabama
